title: Have Smart Homes Gone Too Far...?
description:
Quinn answers the question: is making a home gym "smart" overkill?
Check out amazing products at Aqara store: https://www.amazon.com/Aqara?maas=maas_adg_7BC1544AC2B589DD2982A8BF76E0E2B0_afap_abs&ref_=aa_maas&tag=maas

Follow me on Instagram - http://instagram.com/snazzyq

Quinn shows the smart gym he built out in an effort to get into shape. The effort was lost late last year—but re-tried early this year. Is making smart gym equipment like Tonal, Tempo, Liteboxer, and Peloton a dumb idea? Have we gone too far? How much smart home is too much smart home? In this video, we discuss!
